main.title: a weathered house
main.body: a yellow home sticks out of the ground like a stain in the landscape, no accompanying road or houses nearby to indicate it as part of a neighborhood. the siding is peeling, the windows are broken, and the door hangs open, unmoving in the dead atmosphere.

hall.title: the entrance hall
hall.body: the front door opens into a hallway, with an entrance to either side for a moldy bathroom and a living room. old photos and paintings hang in the hallway, which leads to a kitchen.

living.title: the living room
living.body: a smashed television hangs from the far wall above a fireplace, with a few sets of furniture facing it. another threshold leads to the kitchen. there's a shred of newspaper on the coffee table, blank, but its other side shows a part of a headline: "seti finds..."

kitchen.title: the kitchen
kitchen.body: the kitchen is small, complete with only a few rotted chairs around a fallen table and a refrigerator. it's still humming, power somehow still reaching it after all this time, but the door hangs open, revealing an empty interior. the freezer door has alphabet magnets on it, a few of them spelling "we miss you mom". there's a door leading to the backyard.

backyard.title: the backyard
backyard.body: a toy car is overturned in the dirt, ash layered on top of it. thereâ€™s an open shed, mostly empty.
